column4: how can I install the latest version of Gaim for Dapper please?
gaim is already the newest version.
it says newevest version, but its old and doesnt support many MSN features from others
so you have the latest version for dapper, if you want their latest beta release then you will have to build it yourself
if you are lucky someone has made a .dep and you can use that other wise you will need to download the source
i am worried if you dont know how to use google that compiling from source might not be for you
Gaim 2.0 beta 3 for Dapper Drake x86  <-- is that the one?
if thats the version you want and you are using dapper with an intel chip then yes
im using Intel chip and Ubuntu Dapper
how do I install the .deb file ?
